New features. Improved reliability. Squashed bugs.
We never stop working to make your TextNow experience better.

TextNow is refreshing its look! In this release we're packing in a new app icon, new logo, and a new default theme color for you to enjoy, with the same great service under the hood.

We never stop working to make your TextNow experience better.

TextNow is refreshing its look! In this release we're packing in a new app icon, new logo, and a new default theme color for you to enjoy, with the same great service under the hood.

We never stop working to make your TextNow experience better.

- Added large font support for Conversations.
- Replaced generic error messages on login with more meaningful and simple error messages.
- Improvements to the dialer page on outgoing calls.
- Improved our handling of notifications for more rel

- Added large font support for Conversations.
- Replaced generic error messages on login with more meaningful and simple error messages.
- Improvements to the dialer page on outgoing calls.
- Improved our handling of notifications for more rel

- Introducing Smart Actions, context-sensitive shortcut buttons that allow you to use the app more efficiently.
- New buttons for SIM card activations with clearer messages.
- Fixed a minor bug with drafts not showing saved pictures or videos in a c

- Introducing Smart Actions, context-sensitive shortcut buttons that allow you to use the app more efficiently.
- New buttons for SIM card activations with clearer messages.
- Fixed a minor bug with drafts not showing saved pictures or videos in a c
- Fixed a bug in the sign-up process
- Fixed a bug in the sign-up process

Animated GIFs are now supported in TextNow!
Various performance improvements.

Animated GIFs are now supported in TextNow!
Various performance improvements.
Bug fixes and various performance improvements.
Bug fixes and various performance improvements.

- Improved the size, shape and quality of media you can share with your contacts.
- Fixed a bug where blocking one number could inadvertently block others.
- Updated support options.
- Various other bug fixes and stability improvements.

- Improved the size, shape and quality of media you can share with your contacts.
- Fixed a bug where blocking one number could inadvertently block others.
- Updated support options.
- Various other bug fixes and stability improvements.

- Fixed a bug on conversations that caused a significant lag when trying to open the camera.
- Fixed a bug where the app would fail to ask you for permission to access your microphone on calls if no previous permission was given.
- Fixed a bug wher

- Fixed a bug on conversations that caused a significant lag when trying to open the camera.
- Fixed a bug where the app would fail to ask you for permission to access your microphone on calls if no previous permission was given.
- Fixed a bug wher

- Fixed a bug that would still send verifications to your old email address if you've updated it in the app.
- Fixed a bug that hid the default notification sound in the list of available sounds.
- Fixed a bug preventing incoming notifications from

- Fixed a bug that would still send verifications to your old email address if you've updated it in the app.

- Fixed a bug that caused text to blink while recording video from fullscreen in TextNow.
- Fixed a bug that caused the Conversation page to break when receiving a message or phone call.
- Fixed a bug that could continue to show ads after purchasing

- Fixed a bug that caused the Conversation page to break when receiving a message or phone call.
- Fixed a bug that could continue to show ads after purchasing
Various performance improvements and minor bug fixes.
Various performance improvements and minor bug fixes.

- Added support for sharing photos, texts and links via TextNow.
- Fixed a bug where incoming call notifications would appear even though notifications were disabled in the the phone's settings.
- Various performance improvements.

- Added support for sharing photos, texts and links via TextNow.
- Fixed a bug where incoming call notifications would appear even though notifications were disabled in the the phone's settings.
- Various performance improvements.

*NEW FEATURE* Now you can use TextNow without WiFi! Get unlimited calling and texting over the Nationwide Sprint Network -- for FREE.  Check if your phone is eligible, and get phone service without the phone bill by clicking on "Free Coverage" in the app

*NEW FEATURE* Now you can use TextNow without WiFi! Get unlimited calling and texting over the Nationwide Sprint Network -- for FREE.  Check if your phone is eligible, and get phone service without the phone bill by clicking on "Free Coverage" in the app

*NEW FEATURE* Now you can use TextNow without WiFi! Get unlimited calling and texting in the US over the Nationwide Sprint Network -- for FREE.  Check if your phone is eligible, and get phone service without the phone bill by clicking on "Free Coverage" i

*NEW FEATURE* Now you can use TextNow without WiFi! Get unlimited calling and texting in the US over the Nationwide Sprint Network -- for FREE.  Check if your phone is eligible, and get phone service without the phone bill by clicking on "Free Coverage" i

- Added the ability to report messages as junk to prevent receiving spam messages in the future.

New & Noticeable:
• Previously you may have noticed some issues with your Contacts showing up incorrectly - A’s under B’s, it was madness. Your contacts should now index and show up correctly. Order has been restored.

New & Noticeable:
• Ad Free+/Premium subscribers: When entering a call forwarding phone number (in the Call Forwarding section of the settings), the default keyboard that now pops up is a numerical one, rather than the standard keyboard.
